languages.text: "Если ты послушаешь себя со стороны, то поймешь, почему Мастером дисциплины назначили меня. Лорд-капитан, позвольте мне лично избавиться от этого мусора".
"Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
languages.original_text: "Если ты послушаешь себя со стороны, то поймешь, почему Мастером дисциплины назначили меня. Лорд-капитан, позвольте мне лично избавиться от этого мусора".

traits.locale_text: "If you listen to yourself, you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
"If you listen to yourself, you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
"Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
"Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
"Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
"Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

languages.text: « Écoutez-vous parler, et vous comprendrez pourquoi j'ai été nommée capitaine d'armes à votre place. Avec votre permission, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je tiens à exécuter personnellement ce fumier. »
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-vous parler, et vous comprendrez pourquoi j'ai été nommée capitaine d'armes à votre place. Avec votre permission, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je tiens à exécuter personnellement ce fumier. »

languages.text: «Solo tiene que escuchar sus propias palabras para entender por qué me nombraron a mí maestra de armas. Lord Capitán, solicito permiso para eliminar a este desecho personalmente».
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

traits.locale_text: «Solo tiene que escuchar sus propias palabras para entender por qué me nombraron a mí maestra de armas. Lord Capitán, solicito permiso para eliminar a este desecho personalmente».

languages.text: “只要你好好听听你说的这些混蛋话，你就会明白他们为什么会选我当戒律大师。舰长大人，我请求您允许我亲手处理掉这个渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

traits.locale_text: “只要你好好听听你说的这些混蛋话，你就会明白他们为什么会选我当戒律大师。舰长大人，我请求您允许我亲手处理掉这个渣滓。”

languages.text: 「自分の言っていることを聞くんだ。彼らがなぜ私をマスター・アット・アームズにしたのか明白だろう。ロード・キャプテン、このゴミを個人的に処分する許可を要求します」
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の言っていることを聞くんだ。彼らがなぜ私をマスター・アット・アームズにしたのか明白だろう。ロード・キャプテン、このゴミを個人的に処分する許可を要求します」

languages.text: "Hört Euch doch einfach selbst zu, dann versteht Ihr, warum man mich zur Master-at-Arms gemacht hat. Lord Captain, ich erbitte die Erlaubnis, diesen Abfall selbst beseitigen zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."

traits.locale_text: "Hört Euch doch einfach selbst zu, dann versteht Ihr, warum man mich zur Master-at-Arms gemacht hat. Lord Captain, ich erbitte die Erlaubnis, diesen Abfall selbst beseitigen zu dürfen."

languages.text: "Kendini bir dinlesen neden beni Silahtar yaptıklarını anlarsın. Lord Kaptan, bu insan müsveddesinin işini bizzat bitirmek için izninizi talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Simply listen to yourself, and you will understand why they made me Master-at-Arms. Lord Captain, I request permission to dispose of this refuse personally."
